name: EXPLIoT

name: FwAnalyzer

name: Firmwalker
description: Searches extracted firmware images for interesting files and information.

description: Software Reverse Engineering suite; handles arbitrary binaries, if you provide CPU architecture and endianness of the binary.

description: Software Reverse Engineering framework, also handles popular formats and arbitrary binaries, has an extensive command line toolset.

name: Trommel
description: Searches extracted firmware images for interesting files and information.

name: FACT Extractor
description: Detects container format automatically and executes the corresponding extraction tool.

name: Firmware Mod Kit
description: Extraction tools for several container formats.

name: Cotopaxi
description: Set of tools for security testing of Internet of Things devices using specific network IoT protocols.

name: dumpflash
description: Low-level NAND Flash dump and parsing utility.

description: Tool for detecting, reading, writing, verifying and erasing flash chips.

name: Samsung Firmware Magic
description: Decrypt Samsung SSD firmware updates.

name: Bus Blaster
description: Detects and interacts with hardware debug ports like UART and JTAG.

name: Bus Pirate
description: Detects and interacts with hardware debug ports like UART and JTAG.

description: Detects and interacts with hardware debug ports like UART and JTAG. Among other protocols.

description: Detects JTAG Pinouts fast.

name: Glasgow

name: J-Link

description: Low Cost Battery Operated Wireless Arduino Board that can be turned into a IEEE 802.15.4 protocol sniffer.

name: YardStick One

description: Software Defined Radio peripheral capable of transmission or reception of radio signals from 100 KHz to 3.8 GHz (full-duplex).

description: Software Defined Radio peripheral capable of transmission or reception of radio signals from 47 MHz to 6 GHz (full-duplex).

name: USRP B Series
description: Software Defined Radio peripheral capable of transmission or reception of radio signals from 70 MHz to 6 GHz (full-duplex).

name: HydraNFC
description: Powerful 13.56MHz RFID / NFC platform. Read / write / crack / sniff / emulate.
